original_text: And unleavened bread, and cakes unleavened tempered with oil, and wafers unleavened anointed with oil: of wheaten flour shalt thou make them.
korean_text: 무교병과 기름 섞인 무교 과자와 기름 바른 무교 전병을 모두 고운 밀가루로 만들고

sentences.original_text: and cakes unleavened tempered with oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 기름에 반죽된 누룩 없는 빵 조각

sentences.original_text: and wafers unleavened anointed with oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 기름에 발라진 누룩 없는 얇은 빵

sentences.original_text: of wheaten flour shalt thou make them
